live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
46998.summary: Some customers in the McIntyre area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
46998.title: Feb 20 – Thunder Bay (McIntyre surroundings) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
